ComicInfo.Summary: Production values for issue #1 were rather low. Interior front and back covers are blank pages. The only ad in the comic is promo cover art for #2 but the image is badly digitized and a little hard to decipher.Red Riding Hood: A young high school girl fights off the advances of her boyfriend who leaves in anger because she isn't ready for sex. The girl finds a book of fairy tales in her room and reads the story of Red Riding Hood for the first time in years. She has an empowering nightmare about the story that gives her the strength to drop her dud of a boyfriend for good.
ComicInfo.Title: Red Riding Hood
